pilotSupport.title: Pilot Support & Training
pilotSupport.description: The IVAO Middle East Division offers localized support for pilots through comprehensive training programs, real-world aviation procedures, airspace guidance, and language assistance. Our training curriculum is designed to enhance pilot skills and knowledge aligned with Middle East and regional aviation standards.

atcTraining.title: ATC Training & Operations
atcTraining.description: The IVAO Middle East Division provides air traffic controllers with comprehensive local training, including structured theoretical courses, live one-on-one mentoring, and certifications based on real-world procedures. Our ATC programs ensure controllers develop expertise that reflect Middle East airspace operations.

divisionTransfer.title: Division Transfer
divisionTransfer.subtitle: Transfer to IVAO Middle East Division (XM) and join our vibrant aviation community
divisionTransfer.emailAccess: You have access to your email registered in IVAO
divisionTransfer.processDescription: In order to apply for division transfer to XM you need to send ONE email from your email that registered in IVAO
divisionTransfer.currentDivisionNote: (XX is the letters of your current division)
divisionTransfer.subject: Subject:
divisionTransfer.emailTemplate: Dear Sir, request transfer to XM division for… (reason for transfer)
divisionTransfer.note1: Make sure to use the exact email format provided above
divisionTransfer.note2: Include your current division letters in the "To" field
divisionTransfer.note3: Replace "VID" with your actual IVAO account number
divisionTransfer.note4: Provide a clear reason for your transfer request
divisionTransfer.note5: Processing may take several business days
